attributes.action: pressure Hu Jintao to recognise the personal, political and religous rights of the Tibetan people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the Chinese government to acknowledge and respect the basic human rights of the Tibetan people, to grant the people of Tibet personal, political and religous freedom. For the people of Tibet to live without fear of persecution in relation to their belief system, lifestyle and culture.
